attributes.action: make derivatives and the practice of short selling shares illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My feeling is that the current credit crunch is fueled in a large part by the various stock market practices such as derivatives that are basically "High stakes gambling"

At least stocks and shares in companies are backed by the assets of the company but betting on whether the share index rises or falls has no physical backing and is just plain gambling like the throw of a dice.

Supposed financial experts are paid huge salaries to invest peoples hard earned savings in such volatile products and make fortunes by betting with other peoples money.

You only have to look at the banks that have been brought down by actions of such experts dabbling in such financial products.

viz. Barings Bank & Nick Leeson
